prompt:
Patient: Hello?

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Benedict Oliver?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: Good to hear from you, Patient. I'm calling on behalf of your primary care doctor, Dr. Peter Smith, just to have a little check-in on how you're doing with your chronic kidney disease. How have you been recently?
responses.our_model: Hello, Mr. Oliver. I'm calling on behalf of your primary care doctor, Doctor Peter Smith, to check in on you. How have you been doing lately?
